answers.answer: My first pregnancy was twins, I couldn't even keep water down because was so sick. My second pregnancy was a little girl & I was sick but not terribly. My third pregnancy I wasn't sick at all, I'm being induced tomorrow and still haven't thrown up once. Each pregnancy is different, I'd say you're just fine and not being sick doesn't mean anything.

Every pregnancy is different,  as every woman.Its hard not to stress. It comes naturally to us mommies.  But it can cause unnecessary stress. Relax breath, think good thoughts,  happy vibes!Take a warm bath light some candles and get away for a few. Keep In mind this pregnancy is going to be full term, no complications,  and healthy!!Healthy pregnancy,  happy baby, & happy mommyGood luck!!!!P.s I'm on my third pregnancy & non of them have been the same might have shared some symptoms,  some worse than others,  or non at allCongratulations!!

Congrats!!My first baby was born early too, at 28 weeks - it was all very sudden, due to preeclampsia. Now, I'm almost 27 weeks with baby #2.I agree, every pregnancy is different. With my first one, I d always stressing and worrying, had lots of headaches and my belly was more and smaller. Now, I try not to even think about it, mainly cause I'm hoping to make it to full term this time.. No headaches, belly is higher and bigger.. But have a bad heartburn, more eight gain, and swallen feet..So is totally normal to feel different second time around. Just try to relax, you'be gone through a lot with the first one, I understand.. This time different is good!!Good luck!

question: This pregnancy of mine is so much different... let's start but saying my frist one I delivered my son at 27 weeks on the dot for a short and think cervix... I had the stich in to before they had to cut it and break my water bag .. anyways my frist pregnancy I was worried about alot .. and nor about delivering early but that I was loose my child .. now I'm pregnant again and I'm not sick at all I'm guessing around 8 weeks currently... my first pregnancy I was beyond sick and now it's like nothing bothers me .. am I just over thinking ? And is this common for woman of 2nd and more pregnancys ? PLEASE HELP calm a momma bear down I'm only 19 and would really hate to go through something rougher then I did the first time .
title: 2nd pregnancy
